## OrganizationalItemsService.getItemsPageFromContainer() method

Gets a paged list of child items of a specified organizational item. This operation returns an instance of 'PageOfItems' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getItemsPageFromContainer({ escapedOrgItemId, pageIndex, pageSize, useDynamicVersion, rloItemTypes, }: {
        escapedOrgItemId: string;
        pageIndex: number;
        pageSize?: number;
        useDynamicVersion?: boolean;
        rloItemTypes?: Array<any>;
    }): CancelablePromise<PageOfItems>;
```

**Returns:**
